name: Core_Memory_move
signature: Core_Result Core_Memory_move(void *p, void const* q, Core_Size n);

parameters.name: p
parameters.description: A pointer to the target memory block.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A pointer to the source memory block.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: The number of Bytes to copy.

description: Assign the values of a source memory block to a target memory block. The memory blocks may overlap.
remarks: This function sets the by-thread error variable on failure.
